document.heading: Public Employee Relations Board Amendment Act of 1998

history.narrative: Law 12-151, the “Public Employee Relations Board Amendment Act of 1998,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 12-259, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on April 7, 1998, and May 5, 1998, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on May 22, 1998, it was assigned Act No. 12-368 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 12-151 became effective on September 18, 1998.
